General.Name: Vital Metals Limited
General.Description: Vital Metals Limited develops and explores for rare earths projects in Burkina Faso, Tanzania, Germany, and Canada. It holds a 100% interest in the Nechalacho Rare Earths Project located in Yellowknife, Northwest Territories. The company also owns interests in the Wigu Hill project located in Tanzania; Nahouri Gold Project located in Burkina Faso; and Aue Cobalt Project located in Germany. Vital Metals Limited was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Sydney, Australia.
